root: ^This is the beginning of the visual novel demo, please give a warm welcome to...
^I will be your host today to show you around here! Okay so what do we have on the menu...
^Speaking about myself... showing the technical abilities of the engine... and.. that's all! So what do you want to know?

SelfIntro: ^So about me, I'm Yuzu! My body was kindly drawn by FractalStella (check him out on Twitter!), my favorite food are fruits and I dream to one day go to Goathland and-
^Ah we are making me sign to continue, okay okay, so what do you want to know next?
Engine: ^So as you saw this engine allow to display text that will be displayed character by character until you click and properly fit it inside the window
^You can also let the user choose what he want to do like the choice you saw before
^The text is written in ink format and is using their Unity plugin to easy parse it
^Now let's speak of the features from the buttons on the bottom right of your screen, we will start with the 'Skip' one
^As its name says, it allow to skip text, try it, I'll ramble for a bit and stop you when I'm done
^Amazing isn't it? It feels like no time passed!
^Along with tha- ah, my paper is empty, well that's all for the technical parts, anything else you want to know?
Ending: ^That's for doing this demonstration, come back again soon!
